Card.name: The perpection
Card.ability: [Battle start] Gain 1 for it power till there is no other character with same power dice.

Card.name: Pararell world
Card.text: The other side of the world
Card.ability: [Character select] Change the power of the dice of that character into 7-(the original dice power).

Card.name: Eyeball CCTV
Card.ability: [Damage occured] If the damage is 3 or more, this character recovers 2 HP.

Card.name: Spoon Murderer
Card.ability: [In action][Clash starts] Break the opponent’s dice, and give 1 damage.

Card.name: Counter-slasher
Card.ability: [Get damaged] Reduce 1 damage, and reflect 1 damage to the opponent character. If the character has the dice-0, reduce half of the damage and reflect it instead.

Card.name: Restligeist
Card.ability: [Death] Give a card {Poltergeist [Battle start] Gain 2 counts, and damaged by count} to the opponent who killed this character.

Card.name: Poltergeist
Card.ability: [Battle start] Gain 2 counts, and damaged by count

Card.name: Graverobber
Card.text: Sorry.. But I need your power
Card.ability: [Team's death]Gets one more dice from dice-2 to dice-6. [Enemy's death]Get a card.

Card.name: Before the leaf falls
Card.ability: [Death] Revive with 1 HP. Be invulnerable, and gains 4 for power during next turn.

Card.name: Organ trafficking
Card.ability: [Active] Gain 1 power by paying 0~1 HP.

Card.name: Fixer, Merchant
Card.text: Here is a medicine! Don't think about behind me!
Card.ability: Recover 7 HP when you get this card. [Battle start] Gets 4 damage for every 4 turns.

Card.name: Alchemic Enchantment
Card.ability: [Damage occurred]Gain the counter on this card as much damage as it just occurred. [Active] Get a card by removing 15 counters on this card.

Card.name: Tained Four-leaf Clover
Card.text: The luck here is long gone
Card.ability: [발동] 자신위력이 2 이하일때 5위력 이상의 모든 캐릭터들의 주사위를 파괴한다

Card.name: Reality denial
Card.text: No it not be.. give me one chance!
Card.ability: [합 시작] 자신위력이 상대위력보다 낮으면 주사위를 다시 굴린다 이후 [합 승리]시 피해만큼 체력회복

Card.name: M.A.D
Card.text: Now I am become Death, the destroyer of worlds
Card.ability: [합 패배] 모든 상대팀 캐릭터에게 1 피해를 준다

Card.name: Bloody Memory
Card.text: I didn't want to recall those memories
Card.ability: [공격받음] 상대에게 피해의 절반(올림)을 준다

Card.name: Fatal single blow
Card.text: 방심하는 순간 그 뒤는 무시할 수 없어
Card.ability: [피해줌] 피해 2 이하일시 두 배가 된다

Card.name: NerveDrone
Card.ability: [피해받음] 피해 2 이하일시 회피한다

Card.name: Fair blood donor
Card.ability: [발동][일회성] 생존한 모든 캐릭터의 체력을 평균치로 조정한다(올림)

Card.name: 눈알CCTV
Card.ability: [피해발생] 3 피해 이상일시 체력 2 회복

Card.name: 책장정리
Card.ability: [피해발생] 3 피해 이상일시 체력 2 회복
